name: KubeflowExperimentRun
description: Create an Experiment and Run with Kubeflow
author: CSE-DevOps
instanceNameFormat: Create an experiment and a run

inputs.name: kubeflowEndpoint
inputs.label: Kubeflow Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input the URL of the Kubeflow workspace you are trying to use. Make sure you put in the url for the homepage in the following format: http://yourURL/

inputs.name: bearerToken
inputs.label: Bearer Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: DO NOT USE RAW TOKEN! For help creating secret variables visit https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/process/variables?view=azure-devops&tabs=yaml%2Cbatch#secret-variables

inputs.name: pipeline
inputs.label: Pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose the pipeline you would like to run.

inputs.name: useDefaultVersion
inputs.label: Use Default Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, will use the original version created with the pipeline.

inputs.name: pipelineVersion
inputs.label: Pipeline Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose the pipeline version you would like to run.

inputs.name: createNewRun
inputs.label: Create New Pipeline Run
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked will create new pipeline run

inputs.name: runName
inputs.label: Run Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the new run.

inputs.name: pipelineParams
inputs.label: Pipeline Params
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input any parameters you would like to add in the following format: [{"name":"VAR_NAME", "value":"VAR_VALUE"}, {"name":"VAR_NAME", "value":"VAR_VALUE"}]

inputs.name: waitForRunToFinish
inputs.label: Wait for run to complete
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the task will monitor the runs status and fail if the run fails.

inputs.name: experiment
inputs.label: Experiment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose to create a new experiment or use an existing one.

inputs.name: experimentName
inputs.label: Experiment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name a new experiment, or choose an existing experiment.
